channel.title: U-X on Syniti Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in U-X on Syniti Documentation

item.title: User (Org Unit Assignments)
item.description: User (Org Unit Assignments) Use this page to Assign Users to Org Units. To access this page: SelectdspCompose > Configuration > Userson *Navigation *pane. ClickOrg Unitsfor a user. Click Assignmentsfor an Org Unit. Field Description Select All Click to assign all Org Units to the selected user. Unselect All Click to unassign all Org Units for the selected user.

item.title: User (Org Units)
item.description: User (Org Units) Use this page to Assign Users to Org Units. To access this page: Select dspCompose > Configuration > Userson *Navigation *pane. Click Org Unitsfor a user. Field Description ORG UNIT ID Displays name of Org Unit. Assignments Click to open the*User (Org Unit Assignments)*page to manage Org Unit assignments for the selected user.

item.title: User H
item.description: User H Users V Use this page to: Add Users to dspCompose™ Set up Workflow Messages To access this page, select dspCompose > Configuration > Usersfrom *Navigation *pane. Field Description USER ID Displays user ID to which roles are assigned. User must be added to System Administration before being granted role security. SEND WORKFLOW If enabled, workflow emails are enabled for the user.

item.title: User Template Filter
item.description: User Template Filter Use this page to Create Review Filters. To access this page: ClickdspCompose > Teamon *Navigation *pane. ClickTemplatesfor a team. Click Usersfor a template. Click Review Filterfor a user. Field Description COLUMN NAME Displays column name used in the comparison operation to limit data within the view being changed. CONDITIONAL Displays operation used to link the COLUMN NAME and the VALUE fields.

item.title: User Template Role Access
item.description: User Template Role Access Use this page to Add Users to Templates Grant Template Access at the Global Level To access this page: Select dspCompose > Configuration > Usersfrom *Navigation *pane. Click Templatesfor a user. Field Description TEMPLATE Displays name of template for which security is to be set. ROLE ID Displays role for the template.

item.title: Workflow Language Message H
item.description: Workflow Language Message H Workflow Language Message V Use this page to Configure Workflow Messages and Update the EMAIL FROM column. To access this page: Select dspCompose > Configuration > Workflow Messagein the Navigation pane. Click Messagesfor a LANGUAGE ID. Field Description EVENT Displays event that triggers the workflow email to be sent. SUBJECT Displays subject line of workflow email.

item.title: Workflow Message
item.description: Workflow Message Use this page to Configure Workflow Messages. To access this page, select dspCompose > Configuration > Workflow Messagein the Navigation pane.
